title: Controll message
description: The controll message is created at the end of initialization, reconciliation or asynchronous reply

currentEvents.title: current number of events
currentEvents.description: Current number of events within the batch (with the same X-Correlation-ID) that has been sent from event producer aka primary system

totalEvents.title: total events
totalEvents.description: Total number of all events within the batch (with the same X-Correlation-ID) that has been sent from event producer aka primary system

created.title: date time of control event the creation
created.description: The date and time of the beginning of the exchange rate list code book validity. The date follows ISO 8601, time zone is expected

index.description: Contains information about the X-Correlation-ID or Elastic Search index.

version.description: Version of the error response structure

jtCode.description: Business error code if defined in CSC or RFC 7231 error code

message.description: Error description defined in CSC according to the type and sensitivity of the service.

location.description: The path to the element in the request message that is causing the error.

paramName.description: The name of the parameter in the message string, e.g. 'Insufficient funds – account number %1.' -> paramName = 1

paramValue.description: The value of the parameter in the message string, e.g. 'Insufficient funds – account number 15-135169.' -> paramValue = 15-135169

internalErrors.description: Array of internal error codes and error descriptions according to the service provider

code.description: Internal error code according to the application / system which is the service provider.

message.description: Internal description of the error according to the application / system which is the service provider.
